name: Race On Ice 2021 Pro
description:
Racing Game

3 Modes : Time Attack , Race and Season


- Season 2020-2021 of R.O.I Pro

12 drivers 6 teams and 6 tracks

Race with 5-6 cars Season 6 races



- Season 2020-2021 of R.O.I Lite

12 drivers 6 teams and 6 tracks

Race with 5-6 cars Season 6 races


- 4 Songs

Only keyboards and mouse

This game includes :

- Fake names

- Fake tracks

- Fake teams

- Fake cars

No licence
